instructions: Tap the Photos app on the iPhone or iPad Home screen. Tap Photos at the bottom of the screen to see all your photos grouped by the date they were taken. Locate the date or group of photos you want to delete. Tap Select at the top of the screen to select every photo in the group. Tap the Trash can icon to remove the selected images.

Open the Photos app. Tap the Albums icon to go to the Album view. Scroll to the bottom of the Album view screen and tap the Recently Deleted folder. Tap Select at the top of the screen. Tap Delete All at the bottom of the screen and confirm the deletion.
